entry.title: Video summarizations of blocksize issues?
entry.summary: In an email dated June 18, 2015, a person named odinn asked for a parallel presentation of the concepts and arguments from the other side(s) regarding technical issues related to voting/adoption, particularly for those who are not familiar with development circles. They also suggested the possibility of presenting these concepts and arguments in a wiki format. The context suggests that this person is interested in learning more about the different perspectives on the issue and wants to make an informed decision. The email also raises the question of whether such a resource is even necessary or valid. Along with the email, odinn also shared a YouTube video that may have prompted their interest in the topic.
